items.sentence: Tom told Mary he didn\'t want her to do that anymore.
Tom told Mary he thought she\'d already drunk enough.
Why didn\'t you tell me you were planning to be here?
Tom decided that he didn\'t really like staying here.
Tom did something he didn\'t want Mary to know about.
Are you saying Tom is the one who stole your bicycle?
If it were not for air and water, nothing could live.
Tom told Mary that John doesn\'t like to play tennis.
Tom is sure to accomplish whatever he sets out to do.
Tom shouldn\'t have accepted gifts from his students.
